title: VD, name your contacts

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sexually transmitted diseases
description: An examination of some typical attitudes and reactions of people who have contracted venereal disease, this film stresses the importance of revealing contacts in order to control its spread. Various young people are viewed discussing their situation with a doctor and nurse and each other showing the difficulties involved in the attempt to locate contacts who carry this highly contagious disease.
